item.description:
Well everyone - its been a while since we all got together, and since the weather is getting much nicer out we thought it would be a good time to get everyone together again. Figured we'd do Breakhart since we know its a good spot, but suggestions are always welcome for future venues.

Hope to see everyone in a couple of weeks.
item.why: The weather is finally nice, and it's always fun to see everybody.

group.name: Shiba Inu Meet Up of Eastern MA & Southern NH

item.name: May Meetup!
